title: Which statue should be sunken for Ocean Week if we reach the goal?

embed.description: The sun is shining and the waves are up, which means the Australia Day and Waitangi Day long weekends are not far off! To celebrate we're issuing a challenge of aquatic proportions. If you can rally together as a community and contribute enough points during Ocean Week you will unlock rewards for everyone that participates.

body: So, Ocean Week is coming! Which champion, if we were to reach the goal, would you vote on to be sunken into the depths of the sea?

replies.body: naut. lets be real, he fits it the best. anyone that's read his lore would vote for him.
No one should pick Fizz, we don't need to give the ocean that much cancer.
Nami because she is from the sea and still has her kind living in the sea, Fizz will just troll pole this poll and prob come first or last
Well I'd love a nami statue sunk, it would give me a really awesome reason to do my diver refresher course.

Fizz because, in mafia speak, I would be glad if he were sleeping with the fishes.

Howecer, I voted Nautilus because that is swanky, but I rate him 100 for this and Nami 99, so it is pretty close.
Naut is the best choice anything else is silly
Urf is, let us no forget the manatees.

Im only going for fizz because

He's cute.

If fish never exist, naut definitely
{{champion:105}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:105}}
Why is there no option for you? I heard Riot may actually pay a visit to some randoms home and sink them rather than a statue.
